message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed fruit, cinnamon, and nutmeg topped with a small amount of maple syrup.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, zucchini) and a lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner: Roasted sweet potato and green beans with a side of lentil soup.

Day 2:
Breakfast: Smoothie made from banana, mixed berries, spinach, and coconut milk.
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, and a light vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Baked tofu with sesame seeds served over brown rice and steamed broccoli.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding made with almond milk, vanilla extract, and maple syrup. Topped with mixed fruit and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Lunch: Zucchini noodles with marinara sauce and sautéed onions and mushrooms.
Dinner: Baked cod with lemon and herbs served with roasted asparagus.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, tomatoes) and a side of whole-grain toast.
Lunch: Black bean and avocado wrap in a tortilla with lettuce, tomato, and salsa.
Dinner: Spaghetti squash topped with marinara sauce and grated carrots.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt-free smoothie made from banana, spinach, almond milk, and vanilla extract. Topped with mixed fruit and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Lunch: Grilled chicken or tofu stir fry with bell peppers, broccoli, and water chestnuts in a gluten-free teriyaki sauce. Served over quinoa.
Dinner: Baked stuffed eggplant with lentil filling, tomato sauce, and herbs.

Day 6:
Breakfast: Berry-banana smoothie made from almond milk, banana, mixed berries, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Lunch: Quinoa tabbouleh salad with parsley, tomatoes, cucumbers, and a lemon-mint dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken or tofu fajitas with bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes in a gluten-free fajita seasoning. Served with brown rice.

Day 7:
Breakfast: Omelet made with eggs, mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, tomatoes), and a side of whole-grain toast.
Lunch: Grilled chicken or tofu salad with romaine lettuce, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a light vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Baked salmon with lemon and herbs served over steamed green beans and quinoa.

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day!
